Articles.Content:
As the title says, FRAPS isn't recording KSP anymore, the frame counter thing doesn't show up either, it was working yesterday, and I haven't changed any settings since then.

Also, before someone suggests to use OBS or some other recording program, OBS lags KSP a LOT, and the built-in Windows 10 game recording thing doesn't work for me.

I've tried restarting FRAPS and restarting KSP, neither worked.

Edited September 26, 2016 by CAKE99
